Detailed Description

Preprocessing stage statistics of NessieOcr.

This class stores all the statistical data gathered during execution of methods of the preprocessing stage. Data can be write or read, although a client program should be only interested in reading values. The statistical data is automatically set whenever a method from a Preprocessor object is called, but only the fields that method uses.

See also:
Statistics, Preprocessor
